type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Invalid Exchange API Secret

definition.text: The secret in the Exchange API Key you provided was not recongnized by the Exchange as a valid secret for the particular key.

paragraphs.text: Most errors associated with the Exchange Account Key originate from the handling of the keys provided by the exchange. Please double-check the typical issues listed below!
Copy the public key in the codeName property and the secret key in the secret property.
Make sure you don't bring invisible characters from the exchange's website.

Make sure you don't leave foreign characters from the sample text. To be extra sure, you may copy the code of the configuration below into a text editor, paste the keys, and then replace the whole configuration code in the corresponding node.
Make sure that the keys are not disabled at the exchange.
If the keys are IP restricted, double-check the IP address. Try without restrictions until you rule out other potential issues.
In the following section, you will find the information recorded when the error occurred.
You will only see the information if you opened this page as a result of the error actually occurring.
